str.name: contact
str.val: We are contacting Adobe to activate this copy of {0} using the serial number you have provided.

str.name: contact_forced
str.val: We are contacting Adobe to activate this copy of {0}

str.name: already
str.val: This serial number has already been activated on 2 computers.

str.name: alreadyError
str.val: This serial number has already been activated on 2 computers. You must correct this problem to continue.

str.name: retryOption
str.val: Retry Activation. I have already deactivated one of my other computers.

str.name: provide
str.val: Provide another serial number for this product.

str.name: buyWarning1
str.val: If you choose Remind Me Later, you will have {0} days to correct the problem or the software will stop working.

str.name: buyWarning2
str.val: This will be the last use of this product unless corrected.

str.name: buyWarning3
str.val: You must correct this problem to continue to use this product.

str.name: buyWarningRefuse
str.val: If you choose Remind Me Later, you are required to correct this problem upon the next product launch.

str.name: buyWarningRefuse2
str.val: You are required to correct this problem to use this product.

str.name: learn
str.val: To learn more about Activation, please refer to the {0}Adobe Activation Policy.{1}

str.name: sninvalid
str.val: This serial number appears to be invalid.

str.name: hasfailure
str.val: We were unable to activate your product. Press Retry to try again. For more information, please refer to the {0}Adobe Activation Policy.{1}

str.name: hasfailure1
str.val: We were unable to activate your product. Press Retry. For more information, please refer to the {0}Adobe Activation Policy.{1}

str.name: mustDeactivate
str.val: To correct and successfully activate this product you must deactivate one of the other activated copies.

str.name: deactivateInstruct
str.val: Launch one of the other copies of {0}, click on the Help menu and select Deactivate, then launch this copy again. If you already deactivated, try again.

str.name: success
str.val: This copy of {0} has been successfully activated and is ready to use.

str.name: error
str.val: Please connect to the Internet, then press Continue

str.name: serialError
str.val: This serial number is not valid for this product.

str.name: trial
str.val: Continue to use as a trial

str.name: serialError
str.val: This serial number is not valid for this product.

str.name: instruct
str.val: An Adobe ID is required in order to use this software as a trial. You will have 7 days from the first launch of your trial to enter an Adobe ID.

str.name: locateTT
str.val: Your serial number is located on the back of your DVD holder, on your Adobe Volume Licensing certificate, or in your e-mail receipt from the Adobe Store (download purchases only).

str.name: one
str.val: One more use of this product is permitted. After this use, you will need to enter a serial number to continue.

str.name: nomore
str.val: You may convert this trial by purchasing the product and entering the serial number.

str.name: used
str.val: This serial number will be used for: {0}

str.name: agree
str.val: In accordance with the Software License Agreement, the software will automatically attempt to activate over the Internet. See {0}www.adobe.com/go/activation{1} for details.

str.name: instruct
str.val: There was a problem starting your trial of {0}. To continue to use this product, please go back and enter your serial number.

str.name: instruct
str.val: Deactivating allows you to activate your Adobe product on another computer, provided you are acting in accordance with the {0}Software License Agreement{1}. Make sure you are connected to the internet before you deactivate.

str.name: tooltip1
str.val: Deactivates your product without removing the serial number.

str.name: tooltip2
str.val: Deactivates your product and removes the serial number.

str.name: failure
str.val: Deactivation was not successful. Please try again.

str.name: instruct1
str.val: The serial number you entered is valid, but a qualifying product cannot be found on this computer.

str.name: instruct2
str.val: To use the serial number you entered for your upgrade, you must own one of these qualifying products. Please choose the one you own and enter its serial number:

str.name: second
str.val: This upgrade requires a second qualifying product. Select the second product you own and enter its serial number:

str.name: nogood
str.val: This serial number is not for a qualifying product. Please try another.

str.name: account
str.val: If you have registered products in the past, you can go to {0}your account page{1} to find your existing serial numbers.

str.name: instruct1
str.val: Relay the following code to your service representative upon request:

str.name: instruct2
str.val: Enter the code your service representative gives you:

str.name: title
str.val: Licensing for this product has stopped working

str.name: message
str.val: You cannot use this product at this time. You must repair the problem by uninstalling and then reinstalling this product or contact yout IT administrator or Adobe customer support for help.

str.name: sure
str.val: Are you sure you want to close this dialog?

str.name: eula
str.val: Are you sure? Declining the EULA will quit the application.

str.name: noservices
str.val: Getting Started: Adobe Products and Services

str.name: services
str.val: Getting Started: Adobe Products and Services

str.name: subscription_1_2
str.val: Getting Started with your Acrobat X Subscription

str.name: trialRegWithoutServices
str.val: Thank you for providing your Adobe ID and registering your software.

str.name: trialRegWithServices
str.val: By providing an Adobe ID, you have set up access to Acrobat.com services during your trial period.

str.name: regRegWithoutServices
str.val: By providing your Adobe ID, you have registered your product and now have access to online services at Acrobat.com.

str.name: regRegFailWithoutServices
str.val: Could not register your product at this time. Try again later.

str.name: regRegFailWithServices
str.val: Could not start your Acrobat.com subscription. Try again later.

str.name: regRegIDCreate
str.val: We’ve used your Adobe ID to register your software and set up access to Acrobat.com services.

str.name: regRegIDUsed
str.val: By providing your Adobe ID, you have registered your product and now have access to online services at Acrobat.com.

str.name: regRegSubscription_1_2
str.val: We've used your Adobe ID to set up your subscription and establish Acrobat.com services.

str.name: emailVerify
str.val: Email verification is required to start using Acrobat.com services. Check your email inbox.

str.name: profile
str.val: Your Adobe ID profile is almost complete. Answer a {0}few simple questions{1} and get a complimentary gift from Adobe.

str.name: code_EXCEPTION_TRIAL_EXISTS_FOR_TRIALID
str.val: You have already signed up for Acrobat.com. Please sign in to use services.

str.val: This serial number already has an Acrobat.com subscription associated with it. Please sign in to use services.

str.val: Could not start your Acrobat.com subscription. Try again later.

str.name: code_ESS_FAILURE
str.val: Could not start your Acrobat.com subscription. Try again later.

str.name: code_EXCEPTION_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE_noService_time
str.val: Adobe Registration server is currently undergoing maintenance and is expected to be available at {0}. We apologize for this inconvenience. Please try again at that time.

str.name: code_EXCEPTION_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE_noService_noTime
str.val: Adobe Registration server is currently undergoing maintenance. We apologize for this inconvenience. Please try again later.

str.name: code_EXCEPTION_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE_Service_Time
str.val: Acrobat.com is currently undergoing maintenance and is expected to be available at {0}. We apologize for this inconvenience. Please try again at that time.

str.name: code_EXCEPTION_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE_Service_noTime
str.val: Acrobat.com is currently undergoing maintenance. We apologize for this inconvenience. Please try again later.

str.name: instruct
str.val: The serial number you used to activate this product has expired. This is your last opportunity to launch the product before it is automatically deactivated. To reactivate, you must provide a new serial number or start a trial on next launch.

str.name: purchase
str.val: You may purchase a new serial number from Adobe.com.

str.name: agree
str.val: In accordance with the Software License Agreement, the software will automatically attempt to activate over the Internet. See {0}www.adobe.com/go/activation{1} for details.

str.name: instruct
str.val: Product Activation is required to run this product. In order to activate your product, please ensure that you are connected to the internet or follow the simple steps below.

str.name: rb1
str.val: Retry Activation. Please connect to the internet to activate.

str.name: rb2
str.val: Contact Customer Support. Activate your product over the telephone.

str.name: rb3
str.val: Remind Me Later. You will have {0} days to complete activation before your product becomes disabled.

str.name: rb3B
str.val: You must activate this product before your next use.

str.name: instruct
str.val: If you are unable to access the internet with this computer, please contact Customer Support to activate your product. Click here to find the nearest {0}Customer Support{1} contact.

str.name: require
str.val: You will need the following to activate:

str.name: userSerial
str.val: The serial number you entered for this product is:

str.name: providedSerial
str.val: Please enter an activated Serial Number from Customer Support:

str.name: info
str.val: To launch your product you will need a subscription serial number. Click SUBSCRIBE NOW if you are new to Creative Suite Subscriptions.

str.name: currentInfo
str.val: If you already have a Acrobat X Subscription Edition serial number, please click NEXT to enter it and begin. All current subscribers of Acrobat 9 Subscription Edition should have received an upgrade serial number via email.

str.name: setUp
str.val: Set up your new subscription account

str.name: billing
str.val: Subscription billing and management is handled through eSellerate, a third party provider.

str.name: newPurchase
str.val: All newly purchased subscriptions include a coupon code (located on the back of your disk) that you will be able to redeem to receive your first month of subscription for free.

str.name: subscriptionInfo
str.val: Subscription billing and management is handled through eSellerate, a third party provider.

str.name: expiredInfo
str.val: To use the product you will need to purchase a subscription through eSellerate.

str.val: Could not start your Acrobat X subscription. Try again later.

str.name: code_EXCEPTION_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE
str.val: We are currently undergoing maintenance. We apologize for this inconvenience. Please try again later to start your subscription.

str.name: associateFailed
str.val: We are unable to activate your product at this time. You can hit the Back button to try to activate the product again, or to attempt to launch the product in trial mode.

str.name: associateFailed_ID
str.val: We are unable to activate your product at this time. You can hit the Back button to try to activate the product again.

str.name: assocUserNotAuthErr
str.val: The Adobe ID you entered is different than the Adobe ID used to originally activate this subscription. You can hit the Back button to try to activate the product again using a different Adobe ID, or to activate the product using a new subscription serial number.

str.name: assocUserNotAuthErr_ID
str.val: The Adobe ID you entered is different than the Adobe ID used to originally activate this subscription. You can hit the Back button to try to activate the product again using a different Adobe ID.

str.name: checkEntitlementFailed
str.val: We are unable to activate your product at this time. Please try again later.

str.name: disAllIntervalErr
str.val: You have exceeded the maximum number of deactivation attempts allowed in this time period. Please try again later.

str.name: instruct_exp
str.val: The serial number you used to purchase this product has expired. If you did not intend to let your Design Premium subscription expire, please call Adobe Customer Care at 1800-614-863 to resolve the issue.

str.name: instruct_bonus
str.val: The serial number you used to purchase this product has expired. This is your last opportunity to launch the product before it is automatically deactivated. To reactivate, you must provide a new serial number now. If not, your next launch will start in trial mode and you can provide a new serial number at that time. If you did not intend to let your Design Premium subscription expire, please call Adobe Customer Care at 1800-614-863 to resolve the issue.

str.name: purchase
str.val: You can purchase a new subscription serial number through eSellerate, a third party provider.

str.name: disassociate
str.val: Deactivate all computers and retry activation. You will be able to reactivate on one of your other computers by logging in with your AdobeID at product launch.

str.name: provide
str.val: Provide another serial number for this product.

str.name: contact
str.val: We need to contact Adobe Servers every thirty days to validate the status of your Design Premium subscription. In order to conduct this validation you must be connected to the internet. After we have verified your status, you can disconnect from the internet.

str.name: contactExp
str.val: We need to contact Adobe Servers every thirty days to validate the status of your Design Premium subscription. In order to conduct this validation you must be connected to the internet. After we have verified your status, you can disconnect from the internet. If you do not successfully connect to the internet, this will be the last time you will be able to launch your product offline.

str.name: error
str.val: Please connect to the Internet, then press Continue
